button.learnMore.description: Text displayed on the button to learn more about the services.

button.apply.description: Text displayed on the button to apply for the services.

button.introduction.description: Text displayed on the button to view the service introduction.

button.apis.description: Text displayed on the button to view the API description.

button.pricing.description: Text displayed on the button to view pricing information.

field.apis.description: The service's API, which is a form of online service.

field.proxies.description: The service's proxy, which is a form of online service used for transmitting data via HTTP.

message.free.description: Text displayed when the service is free, indicating that the service is free.

message.around.description: Text displayed when the price is approximately at a specific value.

message.welcomeCredits.description: Text displayed when the service offers free welcome credits.

message.appliedCount.description: Text displayed when counting the number of applications.

message.indexTitle.message: A Smart Choice for Your Digital Services

message.indexSubtitle.message: Empowering Your Work and Life with Excellence in Services.

message.packages.message: We offer credit packages, the more packages you purchase, the greater the discount.
message.packages.description: Text displayed when the service offers credit packages.

message.offer.description: Text displayed when the service provides an offer.

message.partnersTitle.description: The title for the partners section.

title.apis.description: The service's API, which is a form of online service.

title.proxies.description: The service's proxy, which is a form of online service used for transmitting data via HTTP.

title.packages.description: The service's packages used for purchasing credits, for example, the service offers 3 packages: 100 dollars for 100 credits, 200 dollars for 200 credits, and 300 dollars for 300 credits.

unit.credit.description: Credits are the virtual currency used in the API service.

unit.Credit.description: Credits are the virtual currency used in the API service, this is the capitalized form.

unit.credits.description: Credits are the virtual currency used in the API service, this is the plural form.

unit.Credits.description: Credits are the virtual currency used in the API service, this is the capitalized and plural form.

unit.call.description: A call is the number of times the API service is invoked.

unit.Call.description: A call is the number of times the API service is invoked, this is the capitalized form.

unit.calls.description: Calls are the number of times the API service is invoked, this is the plural form.

unit.Calls.description: Calls are the number of times the API service is invoked, this is the capitalized and plural form.

unit.MB.description: MB stands for megabytes, a unit of digital information storage.

unit.GB.description: GB stands for gigabytes, a unit of digital information storage.
